perk.mestiere.farming.green_thumb.messag: You can now harvest plants without breaking them!

perk.mestiere.farming.green_thumb.name: Green Thumb
perk.mestiere.hunting.hunter.message: You've learned how to skin your kills

perk.mestiere.hunting.sharp_shooter.mess: You excel at hitting targets from afar

perk.mestiere.slaying.slayer.message: You've learned how to pick corpses clean
